title: Kim and Art
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA. The Philadelphia Art Alliance, Philadelphia, PA, until January 1951; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, January 25, 1951 until November 1, 1951 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1951.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased the lithograph from The Philadelphia Art Alliance for $35 in January 1951 (see invoice dated January 13, 1951 with receipt of payment stamped January 25, 1951.) The lithograph was accessioned by Carnegie Institute on November 1, 1951.
